statements: SELECT * FROM air_quality_levels WHERE city_name = 'New York' ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT city_name, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_levels WHERE pollutant_level > 50;
SELECT city_name, monitoring_station FROM air_quality_levels WHERE pollutant_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY city_name ASC, measurement_time DESC;
SELECT city_name, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_levels WHERE city_name IN ('Los Angeles', 'Chicago') AND measurement_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT city_name FROM air_quality_levels WHERE measurement_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT city_name, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_levels WHERE city_name = 'New York' ORDER BY measurement_time DESC, pollutant_level ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(pollutant_level) AS average_level, city_name FROM air_quality_levels GROUP BY city_name HAVING average_level > 50 ORDER BY average_level DESC
SELECT * FROM air_quality_levels WHERE pollutant_type LIKE '%CO%' AND measurement_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT city_name, MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_level FROM air_quality_levels GROUP BY city_name HAVING max_level > 100 ORDER BY max_level DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT city_name, monitoring_station, COUNT(*) AS total_measurements FROM air_quality_levels GROUP BY city_name, monitoring_station ORDER BY total_measurements DESC
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, pollution_level, timestamp FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT device_name, location FROM sensor_devices WHERE operational_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT location, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT device_name, location, operational_status FROM sensor_devices WHERE operational_status = TRUE ORDER BY location, device_name;

SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution, COUNT(id) AS data_points FROM air_quality_data WHERE location IN ('Los Angeles', 'New York') GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_pollution DESC, data_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityReading;
SELECT station_id, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM AirQualityReading;
SELECT timestamp, pollutant_type FROM AirQualityReading WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MonitoringStation ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT effect_name, health_impact FROM PollutionEffect WHERE effect_id = 1;
SELECT reading_id, timestamp, station_id, pollutant_level, pollutant_type FROM AirQualityReading;
SELECT * FROM MonitoringStation WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT effect_name, health_impact FROM PollutionEffect WHERE health_impact = 'High' AND description LIKE '%respiratory%';
SELECT station_name, city, country FROM MonitoringStation JOIN PollutionEffect ON MonitoringStation.city = PollutionEffect.health_impact;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityReading WHERE pollutant_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT city_name, population, pollution_level FROM cities WHERE pollution_level > 50
SELECT reading_timestamp, pm25_level, co_level FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE sensor_id = 101;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE location_id = 201;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 301;
SELECT city_name, population, pollution_level FROM cities WHERE city_id = 401;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_timestamp, pm25_level, co_level FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM pollution_data WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT station_id, measurement_time, pollutant_name FROM pollution_data WHERE value > 50;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_data ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM pollution_sources WHERE source_id <= 5;
SELECT user_id, health_condition FROM health_records WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM air_quality_station ORDER BY station_id DESC;
SELECT location, sensor_id FROM air_quality_station WHERE sensor_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM pollution_data WHERE pollutant_name = 'PM2.5' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM health_records WHERE health_condition = 'Asthma';
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_data WHERE pollution_level < 50 ORDER BY population DESC;
